alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:18PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT AREAS NEAR PERKINSVILLE IN YAVAPAI COUNTY THROUGH 1245 PM MST... At 1217 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Perkinsville, drifting northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, heavy rainfall, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding of normally dry creeks and washes is expected. Locations impacted include... Perkinsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Persons outdoors and in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. Normally dry washes and creeks may experience elevated flows and minor flooding.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
